select field_name from sys_field_tb where parent_field = #{parent_field} and field_value = #{field_value}
select r.* from sys_user_role_tb u, sys_role_tb r where u.user_no = #{user_no} and u.role_no = r.role_no
mapper.insert: insert into sys_task_tb (task_no, task_type, create_user, create_time, receive_role, receive_user, deal_user, task_param, task_title, status, end_time, deal_type) values(#{task_no}, #{task_type}, #{create_user}, #{create_time}, #{receive_role}, #{receive_user}, #{deal_user}, #{task_param}, #{task_title}, #{status}, #{end_time}, #{deal_type})
mapper.update:
